data.title: Obituary for Vaughn Spaulding
data.meta_description: George Vaughn Spaulding of Salem, Indiana passed away Monday,  October 19, 2009 at 7:45 pm in the Floyd County Memorial Hospital of New Albany at the age of 82 years, 4 months and 21 days.  Born:  May 28, 1927 in Salem, Indiana, he was the son of the late Edgar Shelby Spaulding  and Lula Mae...
data.text:
George Vaughn Spaulding of Salem, Indiana passed away Monday, October 19, 2009 at 7:45 pm in the Floyd County Memorial Hospital of New Albany at the age of 82 years, 4 months and 21 days. Born: May 28, 1927 in Salem, Indiana, he was the son of the late Edgar Shelby Spaulding and Lula Mae (Robbins) Spaulding. He married June 22, 1947 to Betty Ann (Marshall) Spaulding, who passed away May 19, 1993 He married January 27, 1996 to Helen E. (Casey) Martin Spaulding, who survives. He retired in 1990 as a Vice President with National City Bank in Salem, which had previously been the Farmers-Citizens Bank. He was a former board chariman and elder of the First Christian Church of Salem and served in WW II as a Seaman 1st Class in the U.S. Navy. He was a 50 year member of the Salem Masonic Lodge #21 F. & A.M. and the Scottish Rite Valley of Indianapolis. He was on the Board of Directors for the Washington County Chamber of Commerce from 1972 to 1975, volunteered at the Washington County Food Bank and was a 13 year volunteer with the American Heart Association. Survivors include: Son: Michael V. Spaulding, Floyds Knobs, Indiana; Son: Phillip D Spaulding, Clarksville, Indiana; Son: Jeffrey L. Spaulding, Salem; Stepson: Dennis L. Martin, Salem; Stepdaughter: Linda J. Chastain, Campbellsburg, Indiana; 8 grandchildren and 1 great grandson. He was preceded in death by 2 brothers and 1 sister.

Funeral Service: 10:30 am Friday at the First Christian Church of Salem.

Visitation: 4 to 8 pm Thursday at Dawalt Funeral Home and after 9:30 am Friday at the church. Interment at Crown Hill Cemetery in Salem.

Memorial Contributions: First Christian Church of Salem 305 East Walnut Street Salem, Indiana 47167

Service Information
